__e: Well, after a few verses of this, this calm just, poof, came over me and I knew right then I was gonna be all right.
To remain calm and stay in a place where you think you will die, that too is the definition of insane.
You can call it a fluke, but I'm gonna call it a guy maintaining composure and waiting for his opportunity.
Take this moment to feel the calm in your body. To feel the peace in every cell of your being.
I'm surprised you're keeping it together at all.
